scripts.db: cd backend && bun prisma migrate dev --name init && bun prisma generate
scripts.setup: bun i && cd frontend && bun i && cd ../backend && bun i
scripts.copy: mkdir dist && copyfiles -u 2 frontend/build/**/* dist/frontend && copyfiles -u 2 backend/dist/**/* dist/backend
scripts.build: bun run prebuild && concurrently  --names Back-End,Front-End --prefix-colors red,cyan "cd backend && bun run build" "cd frontend && bun run build" && bun run copy
